products.name: Killer Whale Plush - Small
products.description: Adorable small orca plushie, perfect for collectors

products.name: Killer Whale Plush - Medium
products.description: Medium-sized orca companion, huggable and cute

products.name: Killer Whale Plush - Large
products.description: Large orca plush, perfect for cuddles

products.name: Killer Whale Figurine Set
products.description: Set of 5 miniature killer whale figurines

products.name: Orca Enamel Pin
products.description: Cool enamel pin featuring a killer whale design

products.name: Killer Whale Merchandise Bundle
products.description: Get everything - plush, figurine, and pin bundle

products.name: The Classic "Panda"
products.description: The iconic black and white pattern. High intelligence, capable of solving puzzles. Recognizes up to 40 distinct user faces.

products.name: Neon-Striped "Vegas"
products.description: Bioluminescent epidermal layer. Glows soft blue at night. Nocturnal cycle programmed for evening entertainment.

products.name: The "Lap-Whale" (Teacup)
products.description: Our smallest variant. Extremely docile. Requires minimal tank space. Note: Cannot hunt live prey; must be hand-fed.

products.name: Barnyard Blue (Pod of 10)
products.description: The standard agricultural unit. Accelerated growth hormone receptors. Reaches harvest maturity in just 14 weeks.

products.name: Wagyu-Whale‚Ñ¢ (Pod of 10)
products.description: Genetically limited movement for maximum fat retention. Rich, buttery texture. Requires high-calorie finishing feed.

products.name: Standard Feeder Kit (Auto-Dispense)
products.description: Proprietary blends to ensure health and maximize output.
products.software: Compatible with our Node.js mobile app for remote feeding.

products.name: The "Finishing" Kit (Livestock Only)
products.description: Use during the final 4 weeks before harvest to increase caloric density.
products.contents: High-fat Herring Oil injector, automated bash script for increasing feeding frequency based on weight sensor data.

products.name: The Sire Series: Genetic Extraction Kit (Male)
products.description: Professional-grade equipment for collecting genetic material from prize males. A medical-grade collection system designed for safety and hygiene.
products.includes: 1x Hydro-dynamic Collection Sleeve (Silicone, Variable Pressure), 1x Cryogenic Storage Flask (Liquid Nitrogen compatible), 1x Hormonal Pheromone Mist (triggers immediate biological response).
products.usage: Manual operation required. Recommended frequency: Once per 72-hour cycle to maintain counts.

products.name: The Matrix Nursery: Gestation Kit (Female)
products.description: Isolates pregnant females to prevent tank aggression.
products.includes: Ultrasound Wand (USB-C connection to laptop), "Calving Cradle" mesh insert to assist newborn surfacing.

products.name: Arctic Ghost (Albino Variant)
products.description: A stunning and rare all-white morph. Extremely sensitive to light, requires a shaded tank environment. Prized by collectors for its ethereal beauty.

products.name: Deep Trench Stalker
products.description: Matte black skin with bioluminescent red angler. Adapted for low-light environments, perfect for home theaters or studies. Naturally shy.

products.name: Coral Reef Chameleon
products.description: Features bio-engineered chromatophores allowing it to slowly shift colors to match its environment. A true marvel of genetic artistry.

products.name: The 'Gaffer' (Old Salt Edition)
products.description: A grizzled, cosmetically scarred variant bred for character. Cantankerous but fiercely loyal once imprinted. Smells vaguely of sea shanties.

products.name: The 'Ronin' (Wanderer)
products.description: A solitary, stoic breed with a single white marking over one eye. Prefers to be the only unit in a tank. For the discerning, introspective owner.

products.name: CEO's 'Black Diamond' Edition
products.description: The ultimate status symbol. Sleek, all-black, with a subtle iridescent sheen. Genetically programmed for calm, gliding movements. A living piece of minimalist art for your corporate lobby.

products.name: Pharma-Whale‚Ñ¢ (B2B Research Unit)
products.description: Not for consumption or companionship. Engineered to produce specific monoclonal antibodies for pharmaceutical research. Sold only to licensed laboratories.

products.name: Imperial Roe-Whale (Female)
products.description: Female-only line engineered for rapid, high-yield roe production. The resulting 'Whale Caviar' is a globally sought-after delicacy.

products.name: Krill-Kibble‚Ñ¢ (15kg Bulk Bag)
products.description: Our standard, nutritionally complete dry food in a cost-effective bulk size. For multi-unit owners and commercial farms.

products.name: Plankton-Paste‚Ñ¢ Subscription (Monthly)
products.description: A monthly subscription box of our high-moisture Plankton-Paste‚Ñ¢. Ensures freshness and is ideal for Teacup breeds or units with dental issues. Price per month.

products.name: Vibrance-Max Color Enhancing Feed
products.description: Feed laced with proprietary carotenoids and minerals to make the colors on our designer breeds (Vegas, Chameleon) more vibrant.

products.name: Live Feeder Shrimp Colony Kit
products.description: A starter kit for owners who want to provide live food for enrichment. Promotes natural hunting behaviors. Self-sustaining with minimal care.
products.includes: Breeding tank, initial shrimp colony, algae wafers.

products.name: CRISPR-Cas14 DIY Kit ('Tiger Stripe' Cartridge)
products.description: For advanced hobbyists only. Apply cosmetic genetic modifications to your own stock. Requires purchase of our sterile application gun. Dwarf Orca is not liable for misuse.

products.name: Grotowski Vector Purity Test (Mail-in)
products.description: Ensure your prized unit is free of genetic drift or illegal third-party modifications. Mail in a water sample containing skin cells, receive a certified report in 2 weeks.
products.includes: 1x sterile collection vial, prepaid bio-hazard return mailer.

products.name: OrcaOS Smart Tank Controller v3.0
products.description: The brain of your aquarium. Automates pH, temperature, salinity, and feeding schedules. Provides real-time alerts to your mobile device.

products.name: Wave-Maker Pro ('Storm Mode' enabled)
products.description: High-powered water circulation pump. Essential for correcting Cryo-Bladder Dysfunction as per our troubleshooting guide. 'Storm Mode' generates turbulent flow.

products.name: Ultrasonic Containment Field Emitter (Pair)
products.description: Emits a high-frequency field that is imperceptible to humans but discourages 'glass surfing' behavior in new units. A humane training tool.

products.name: Holographic Kelp Forest Projector
products.description: For tank enrichment. Projects a calming, interactive 3D kelp forest. The unit can swim through the light beams. Reduces stress in smaller tanks.
products.software: Includes 5 environments: Kelp Forest, Open Ocean, Coral Reef, Arctic Shelf, Shipwreck.

products.name: Auto-Doc Medical Injection System
products.description: For remote health management of high-value assets. Connects to OrcaOS and can be programmed to dispense supplements or emergency epinephrine based on biosensor data.
products.includes: Controller, 2x injection arms, 10x sterile medical darts.

products.name: Dr. Grotowski Action Figure (w/ Lab Coat)
products.description: Collectible action figure of our beloved founder, Dr. Seraphina 'Phin' Grotowski. Comes with a miniature 'Subject Zero' and a detachable lab coat.

products.name: 'Barnyard Blue' Branded Steak Knives (Set of 4)
products.description: The perfect way to enjoy your harvest. German steel, serrated edge, with the Dwarf Orca logo tastefully laser-etched on the blade.

products.name: 'I ‚ù§Ô∏è My Lap-Whale' Bumper Sticker
products.description: Show the world your love for your miniature aquatic companion. Weather-resistant vinyl.

products.name: The Jester (Calico)
products.description: Unpredictable orange, black, and white patterns make each unit unique. Known for their playful and mischievous personalities. Requires extra enrichment toys.

products.name: Omega Yield Pod (Pack of 20)
products.description: Specifically engineered for an extremely high Omega-3 fatty acid content. The resulting meat is marketed as a premium health food product. A favorite of boutique restaurants.

products.name: Kelp Forest Stalker
products.description: A variant with a mottled green and brown skin pattern, providing excellent camouflage in heavily planted aquariums. A shy but fascinating hunter.

products.name: Embryo Cryo-Storage (5-Year Plan)
products.description: Secure the genetic legacy of your prize-winning units. We offer off-site cryo-storage at our state-of-the-art facility in Geneva. Price covers 5 years of storage for up to 10 embryos.

products.name: The Socialite (Mimic)
products.description: A highly social and vocal breed that can learn to mimic simple electronic tones and sounds from its environment. Does not 'speak', but provides active auditory feedback.

products.name: Surrogacy Unit (Sterile Female)
products.description: A sterile female unit, genetically optimized to serve as a surrogate for custom-designed or cloned embryos. For professional breeders aiming to scale their operations.

products.name: Bio-Fueler Pod (Industrial Scale)
products.description: A low-grade livestock variant that produces extremely high quantities of lipids, easily processed into biofuel. Sold only to licensed energy corporations. Price per 100-unit pod.

products.name: Dwarf Orca Corporate Pen
products.description: A high-quality ballpoint pen with the Dwarf Orca logo. The perfect gift for the executive who has everything, including a genetically engineered whale in their lobby.
